mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHOES (SHOESNO, CATENO, MEMBERNO, TITLE, BRAND, RATING, PRICE, DISCOUNT, CONTENTS, VISIBLE) VALUES (#{shoesno}, #{categoryno}, #{memberno}, #{title}, #{brand}, #{rating}, #{price}, #{discount}, #{contents}, #{visible})
mapper.select: SELECT s.*, o.OPTIONNO, o.SIZE, o.AMOUNT, o.COLOR FROM SHOES s INNER JOIN OPTION o ON s.SHOESNO = o.SHOESNO WHERE s.SHOESNO = #{shoesno}
